      • setAcceleratorPedalIntensity

        public void setAcceleratorPedalIntensity(float intensity)
        Accelerates the car forward or backwards. Does it by accelerating both suspensions (4WD). If you want a front wheel drive, comment out the rearSuspension.accelerate(direction) line. If you want a rear wheel drive car comment out the other one.
        Parameters:
        intensity - -1 for full ahead and 1 for full backwards

      • getAcceleratorPedalIntensity

        public float getAcceleratorPedalIntensity()

      • setBrakePedalIntensity

        public void setBrakePedalIntensity(float intensity)
        Brake pedal
        Parameters:
        intensity - 1 for full brake, 0 no brake at all

      • getBrakePedalIntensity

        public float getBrakePedalIntensity()

      • setClutchPedalIntensity

        public void setClutchPedalIntensity(float intensity)
        Clutch pedal
        Parameters:
        intensity - 1 for fully pressed, 0 for fully released clutch pedal
